GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE IMMOBILE CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS STRUCTURE PRELOAD SCORE FS_FACTORY AUTO_RALLYPOINT NEED_BASE_FOUNDATION NOT_AUTOACQUIRABLE DONT_HIDE_IF_FOGGED COVER FS_WAR_FACTORY AUTO_ACQUIRABLE_BY_AI IGNORED_IN_GUI

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end
